#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

using P = pair<int, int>;

int main() {
  int t;
  cout.setf(ios::fixed);
  cout.precision(8);
  cin >> t;
  while (t--) {
    int m, n;
    cin >> n >> m;
    vector<P> v(n);
    for (auto& p : v) cin >> p.first >> p.second;

    long double s = 0, e = 1e11;
    while (e - s > 1e-8) {
      long double r = (s + e) / 2.;
      nth_element(v.begin(), v.begin() + m - 1, v.end(),
          [&](const P &a, const P& b) {
          return a.first - r * a.second > b.first - r * b.second;
          });
      long long num = 0, den = 0;
      for (int i = 0; i < m; ++i) {
        num += v[i].first;
        den += v[i].second;
      }
      //cerr << num << " " << den << " " << r << endl;
      if (num >= den * r) s = r;
      else e = r;
    }
    cout << (s + e) / 2 << endl;
  }
}
